title: [Physics] When flushing public toilets, donâ€™t linger, because aerosolized droplets can be detected at heights of 5 feet for 20 seconds after a flush, even with a closed lid. Aerosolized droplets play a central role in the transmission of infectious diseases, including gastroenteritis and COVID-19.

[Epidemiology] Researchers developed what they claim is the world's fastest diagnostic testing method for the novel coronavirus, a procedure that takes less than 5 minutes. The method can detect the virus even if the amount is very small by checking the reaction inside micro test tubes
